our-journey.title: Our Journey
our-journey.content: Founded in 1945 in Bhilwara, Rajasthan, Namakwala has grown from a salt shopkeeper into India’s leading manufacturer and exporter of Salt and Minerals. Today, we serve industries and households in 50+ countries, delivering products known for purity, quality, and trust.

banner.title: About
banner.heading: Dedication | Growth | Passion

milestones.title: Key Milestones
content: 1945 – Established by Late Shri Badrilal Lohia in Bhilwara, Rajasthan.
1970 – Began professional salt grinding.
1970 – Introduced consumer salt packs, a first in India.
1980 –2000 – Expanded into bulk trade and industrial salts, strengthening domestic presence.
2000 – 2020 – Entered global markets, building strong export relationships.
Today – Recognized as a trusted global supplier of salt and minerals, serving 50+ countries worldwide.

our-vision.title: Our Vision
our-vision.content: To be a global leader in salt and mineral solutions, combining tradition with innovation. We aim to provide sustainable, high-quality products while creating long-term value for customers and partners worldwide.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.content: Namakwala is driven by an experienced leadership team that blends decades of expertise with a forward-looking approach. Guided by our founder’s principles, we continue to innovate, expand, and build strong global partnerships.

founder-legacy.title: Founder’s Legacy
founder-legacy.content: Our journey began with Late Shri Badrilal Lohia, who pioneered the concept of consumer salt packs in India. His vision and dedication laid the foundation for Namakwala’s global success. Today, his legacy of purity, quality, and trust continues to inspire us.

food-grade-salt.title: Food Grade Salt
food-grade-salt.description:
Namakwala’s bring you premium-quality Food Grade Salts that are not just tasty but also healthy. Our Edible Salt meets all prescribed IDD (Iodine Deficiency Disorder) standards and is trusted by households and industries worldwide. Free-flowing, fine in texture, and perfectly balanced in taste, it’s an essential ingredient for everyday cooking and large-scale food production.

Fortified with iodine above natural levels, our Food Grade Salt goes beyond enhancing flavor—it supports overall wellness and nutritional needs. Carefully processed to maintain purity and natural minerals, it guarantees both quality and consistency in every grain.

Trusted globally by chefs, home kitchens, and food manufacturers, Namakwala Food Grade Salts deliver the perfect blend of taste, health, and reliability.

banner.title: Delivering high-quality, sustainable natural sea salt for diverse households & industrial applications worldwide
banner.heading: Healthy, Tasty & Consistent – Food Grade Salt for Every Need

keyFeatures.detail: Free from harmful additives and contaminants.
Contains sodium, calcium, magnesium, and potassium.
Refined iodized salt and more.
Processed under strict hygiene & quality control.
Available in consumer packs and bulk packaging.

applications.use: Essential for everyday meals and seasoning.
Restaurants, hotels, and catering services.
Packaged foods, snacks, and ready-to-eat meals.
Blended in fortified and dietary supplements.
Maintains taste, texture, and preservation.
Ensures preservation and flavor balance.
Improves flavor, preservation, and consistency.

technicalSpecifications.Grades Available: Refined iodized salt, specialty food-grade salts
technicalSpecifications.Iodine Content: As per customer requirement (30 ppm typical)

food-grade-salt.specNote: Specifications and packaging can be customized as per customer needs.
food-grade-salt.note: We export Food Grade Salts to Asia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, and America, catering to both bulk industrial buyers and retail FMCG brands. With our strong logistics and strict quality assurance, we ensure timely delivery and consistent quality in every shipment.

metadata.title: Food Grade Salt - Namakwala
metadata.description: Premium Food Grade Salt fortified with iodine and trusted worldwide for everyday cooking, hospitality, and food processing.
metadata.keywords: food grade salt, edible salt, iodized salt, Namakwala, cooking salt, industrial food salt

openGraph.description: Premium Food Grade Salt fortified with iodine and trusted worldwide for everyday cooking, hospitality, and food processing.

industrial-salt.title: Industrial Salt

banner.title: Industrial Salt
banner.heading: Premium-Grade Raw Material for Global Industries

industrial-salt.description:
Namakwala’s Industrial Salt is one of the most essential raw materials powering a wide range of industries worldwide. Known for its purity, freshness, and consistent quality, our salt is trusted across both domestic and international markets.

We specialize in supplying premium-grade Industrial Salt that meets stringent quality standards. Processed under strict quality control, our salts are carefully classified into different grades to serve diverse industrial needs: Pure Salt, Crystalline Salt, Medium Grade Salt, Super Fine Salt, 30 Mesh Salt, and Coarse (Oversize) Salt.

With accurate composition, consistent purity, and bulk availability, Namakwala Industrial Salt ensures efficiency, reliability, and cost-effectiveness for industries worldwide. Trusted by global manufacturers, we deliver salt that performs beyond expectations in every application.

keyFeatures.detail: Ensures reliability and effectiveness in industrial applications.
Maintains stability and easy handling in bulk usage.
Available in fine, medium, coarse, and mesh-specific grades.
Processed under strict quality and safety standards.
Supplied in large industrial packaging for global supply.

applications.use: Used for caustic soda, chlorine, soda ash & hydrochloric acid production.
Essential in dyeing, bleaching, and finishing processes.
Core ingredient in detergent powders, soaps, and cleaning agents.
Widely applied in tanning & curing of hides.
Used in water softening and purification solutions.
Effective for melting ice and snow in cold regions.

technicalSpecifications.Grades Available: Pure Salt, Crystalline Salt, Medium Grade Salt, Super Fine Salt, 30 Mesh Salt, Coarse (Oversize) Salt

industrial-salt.specNote: Specifications and grades can be customized based on industrial requirements
industrial-salt.note: We export Industrial Salts to Asia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, and America, catering to both bulk industrial buyers and retail FMCG brands. With strong logistics and strict quality assurance, Namakwala ensures timely delivery and consistent quality in every shipment.

crystal-raw-salt.title: Crystal Raw Salt

banner.title: Crystal Raw Salt
banner.heading: Naturally Harvested, Mineral-Rich Raw Salt

crystal-raw-salt.description:
Namakwala’s Natural Crystal Salt, also known as Raw Salt, is the purest form of salt obtained through the natural evaporation of seawater—without the use of artificial methods. Packed with a wide range of naturally occurring minerals, it offers benefits and richness that no synthetic supplement can truly replicate.

At Namakwala Group, we take pride in supplying high-quality Crystal Raw Salt that is naturally harvested and carefully processed to retain its purity, texture, and mineral content. Our raw salt crystals are widely trusted for both industrial and commercial applications around the globe.

With its authentic mineral profile, natural freshness, and versatile usage, Namakwala Crystal Raw Salt is the go-to choice for industries and businesses seeking reliability and quality in bulk salt supply.

keyFeatures.detail: Obtained through natural seawater evaporation without artificial processing.
Packed with naturally occurring minerals that enhance its value.
Supplied in small, medium, and large crystals.
Ensures safe and reliable usage across industries.
Processed to maintain stability and longer shelf life.

applications.use: Ideal for fish preservation and storage.
Effective in reducing hardness of water.
Raw material for caustic soda, soda ash, and chlorine production.
Applied in curing and processing of hides.
Used in purification and softening processes.
Applied to melt ice and snow in cold regions.

crystal-raw-salt.specNote: Specifications and crystal sizes can be customized to meet industrial requirements
crystal-raw-salt.note: We export Crystal Raw Salt to Asia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, and America, catering to both bulk industrial buyers and retail FMCG brands. With strong logistics and strict quality assurance, Namakwala ensures timely delivery and consistent quality in every shipment.

water-softening-salt.title: Water Softening / Pool / Tablet Salt
water-softening-salt.description:
Namakwala’s Water Softening, Pool, and Tablet Salt is premium-grade salt designed to keep swimming pools and spa systems fresh, clean, and inviting. Processed to achieve high purity, fast solubility, and consistent crystal size, our pool salt is the perfect match for saltwater pools and chlorination systems.

Safe, gentle, and eco-friendly, Namakwala Pool Salt ensures crystal-clear water while protecting both swimmers and pool equipment. Its balanced formulation helps maintain effective chlorination levels, reduces chemical usage, and keeps water naturally refreshing.

Trusted by pool owners, resorts, and wellness centers, Namakwala Pool Salt guarantees a refreshing swimming experience with purity you can rely on.

banner.title: Premium Pool & Water Softening Salt Supplier
banner.heading: Crystal-Clear Water, Gentle & Effective Salt Solutions

keyFeatures.detail: 99%+ pure sodium chloride (NaCl) for safe and effective pool use.
Free-flowing salt that dissolves rapidly for immediate results.
Safe, natural salt without additives or harmful chemicals.
Gentle on skin, eyes, and hair while preventing corrosion and scaling in pool systems.
Supports sustainable pool maintenance with reduced chemical usage.
Available in multiple bulk packaging sizes for residential and commercial needs.

applications.use: For use with chlorine generators in swimming pools and spa systems.
Helps maintain balanced mineral levels in pool water.
Ensures clean, safe, and bacteria-free swimming water.
Suitable for hotels, resorts, waterparks, wellness centers, and home pools.

technicalSpecifications.Grades Available: Pool salt, water softening tablets, granular and compacted forms
technicalSpecifications.Iodine Content: Non-iodized (ideal for pools and softening use)
technicalSpecifications.Packaging Options: 10 kg, 20 kg, 25 kg, 50 kg,  Jumbo Bags

water-softening-salt.specNote: Formulation and packaging can be customized for residential or commercial pool requirements.
water-softening-salt.note: We export Pool and Water Softening Salts to Asia, Middle East, Africa, Europe, and America, catering to both bulk commercial buyers and retail brands. With strong logistics and strict quality assurance, Namakwala ensures timely delivery and consistent quality in every shipment.

garnet-abrasive.title: Garnet Abrasive

banner.title: Delivering high-quality, sustainable minerals for diverse industrial applications worldwide
banner.heading: High-Performance Eco-Friendly Industrial Abrasive

garnet-abrasive.description:
Garnet Abrasive is a natural mineral abrasive derived from almandine garnet, known for its hardness, durability, and high specific gravity. With a Mohs hardness of 7.5–8, Garnet is one of the most effective and eco-friendly abrasives used in waterjet cutting, sandblasting, surface preparation, filtration, and abrasive powders.

Unlike silica sand, Garnet is free from hazardous crystalline silica, making it safer, cleaner, and more efficient for industrial applications. We supply high-quality Garnet Abrasive grains and powders in multiple mesh sizes to meet diverse industry requirements.

keyFeatures.detail: Mohs hardness of 7.5–8 ensures fast cutting and cleaning.
Can be reused multiple times in blasting and cutting.
Safe for workers, reduces health risks compared to silica sand.
Delivers faster cutting and superior surface finish.
Ensures stable performance across applications.
Available in coarse, medium, and fine mesh grades.

applications.use: Provides precise, fast, and clean cutting for metals, stone, and composites.
Efficient cleaning and surface finishing.
Used in water filtration for its durability and stability.
Ideal for fine polishing and grinding applications.

garnet-abrasive.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
garnet-abrasive.note: Garnet Abrasive is a safe, silica-free, and eco-friendly mineral abrasive, offering high cutting efficiency, reusability, and consistent performance across multiple industrial applications.

talc.title: Talc

banner.title: Talc
banner.heading: Softest Mineral for Industrial & Consumer Applications

talc.description:
Talc (Mg₃Si₄O₁₀(OH)₂) is a naturally occurring mineral composed of magnesium, silicon, and oxygen. Known as the softest mineral on the Mohs scale (hardness: 1), Talc is valued for its smoothness, chemical inertness, lubricating properties, and high whiteness.

It is widely used in paints, plastics, paper, rubber, cosmetics, ceramics, pharmaceuticals, and agriculture. We supply high-purity Talc Powder and Talc Lumps in different grades to meet diverse industrial applications.

keyFeatures.detail: Provides smooth texture and lubricity.
Ideal for paints, coatings, and paper.
Absorbs moisture, oils, and impurities.
Resistant to acids and alkalis.
Stable at high temperatures, suitable for ceramics and refractories.
Safe for cosmetics, pharmaceuticals, and food-grade applications.

applications.use: Provides smoothness, brightness, and opacity.
Improves strength, stiffness, and processing.
Enhances smoothness, printability, and opacity.
Used in powders, creams, and personal care products.
Improves thermal resistance and durability.
Safe, non-toxic additive for specialized uses.

talc.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
talc.note: Talc is valued for its smoothness, high whiteness, and inertness, making it indispensable in paints, plastics, cosmetics, ceramics, and pharmaceutical industries.

quartz.title: Quartz

banner.title: Quartz
banner.heading: High Purity Mineral for Industrial Applications

quartz.description:
Quartz is one of the most abundant and widely used minerals on earth, valued for its high purity, hardness, chemical resistance, and optical properties. With a hardness of 7 on the Mohs scale, Quartz is an essential raw material in industries such as glass, ceramics, foundry, electronics, construction, and solar energy.

We supply premium-quality Quartz Lumps, Grains, and Powder in various grades and mesh sizes, suitable for diverse industrial applications.

keyFeatures.detail: Available in >99% SiO₂ grades.
Mohs hardness of 7, highly wear-resistant.
Used in glass, lenses, and solar applications.
Inert to acids and alkalis.
Available in multiple sizes: lumps, grains, and powder.
Tailored to specific industry requirements.

applications.use: Raw material for high-purity glass.
Provides strength and thermal stability.
Used in molding and alloy production.
Used in concrete, tiles, and building materials.
Essential in semiconductors and solar panels.
Applied in filters and abrasive materials.

quartz.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
quartz.note: Quartz is valued for its purity, hardness, and optical properties, making it indispensable in glass, ceramics, electronics, construction, and renewable energy industries.

bentonite.title: Bentonite

banner.title: Bentonite
banner.heading: Versatile Clay Mineral for Industrial & Environmental Applications

bentonite.description:
Bentonite is a naturally occurring clay mineral composed mainly of montmorillonite. Known for its swelling, absorption, and binding properties, Bentonite is one of the most versatile industrial minerals. It is widely used in foundry, drilling, iron ore pelletizing, construction, cosmetics, agriculture, and wastewater treatment.

We supply Sodium Bentonite and Calcium Bentonite in lumps, granules, and powder form, customized to meet industry-specific requirements.

keyFeatures.detail: Can absorb several times its volume in water.
Provides high green and dry strength in foundry applications.
Suitable for high-temperature and chemical processes.
Non-toxic mineral with multiple environmental applications.
Available in grades for industrial, agricultural, and cosmetic purposes.

applications.use: Provides binding strength for mold and core making.
Used in drilling muds for lubrication and stability.
Acts as a binder to improve pellet strength.
Used in waterproofing, sealing, and tunneling.
Acts as absorbent in skincare and beauty products.
Improves soil conditioning and animal nutrition.
Removes impurities and suspended particles.

bentonite.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
bentonite.note: Bentonite’s unique swelling, binding, and absorption properties make it indispensable in foundry, drilling, pelletizing, construction, cosmetics, agriculture, and environmental applications.

dolomite.title: Dolomite

banner.title: Dolomite
banner.heading: High-Purity Mineral for Industrial & Agricultural Applications

dolomite.description:
Dolomite is a naturally occurring double carbonate mineral of calcium and magnesium. Known for its high purity, whiteness, and unique chemical properties, Dolomite is widely used in steel, glass, ceramics, paints, plastics, agriculture, and construction industries.

We supply premium-quality Dolomite in lumps, chips, and finely ground powder form, available in various mesh sizes to meet industry-specific requirements.

keyFeatures.detail: Suitable for glass, ceramics, and paint applications.
Essential for agriculture and soil conditioning.
Ideal for steel and refractory industries.
Used in construction, concrete, and asphalt.
Multiple grades for industrial and agricultural use.
Safe for environmental applications.

applications.use: Provides fluxing and heat resistance.
Improves whiteness, durability, and transparency.
Acts as filler, enhances smoothness and strength.
Supplies calcium and magnesium to enrich soil.
Improves durability in concrete, asphalt, and building materials.

dolomite.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
dolomite.note: Dolomite’s purity, heat resistance, and versatility make it an indispensable raw material in steel, glass, ceramics, paints, agriculture, and construction industries.

feldspar.title: Feldspar

banner.title: Feldspar
banner.heading: Essential Mineral for Ceramics, Glass & Industrial Applications

feldspar.description:
FELDSPAR is one of the most important industrial minerals used across multiple industries. It is a group of alumino-silicate minerals containing potassium, sodium, and calcium in varying proportions. Feldspar is highly valued for its alkali content, alumina, chemical inertness, and fluxing properties, making it an essential raw material in ceramics, glassmaking, paints, plastics, and abrasives.

We supply premium-quality Potassium Feldspar (K-Feldspar) and Sodium Feldspar (Na-Feldspar) in different grades and particle sizes to meet diverse industrial requirements.

keyFeatures.detail: Provides fluxing action in ceramics and glass.
Enhances durability and hardness in finished products.
Contributes to brightness in tiles, sanitaryware, and glass.
Stable at high temperatures, ideal for ceramics and refractories.
Widely used in multiple industries.
Natural and non-toxic mineral.

types.name: Potassium Feldspar (K-Feldspar)
types.detail: Rich in potassium oxide, ideal for ceramics and glass.

types.name: Sodium Feldspar (Na-Feldspar)
types.detail: Rich in sodium oxide, used in glass, tiles, and fluxes.

types.name: Ground Feldspar Powder
types.detail: Fine particle size for coatings, plastics, and paints.

applications.use: Key raw material in tiles, sanitaryware, and pottery.
Improves strength, transparency, and workability.
Provides smoothness, brightness, and durability.
Acts as filler, enhancing strength and resistance.
Provides thermal resistance and hardness.

feldspar.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
feldspar.note: Feldspar is a versatile mineral valued for its fluxing, strengthening, and whitening properties, making it indispensable in ceramics, glass, paints, plastics, and refractory industries.

calcined-kaolin.title: Calcined Kaolin

banner.title: Calcined Kaolin
banner.heading: Refined Clay for Industrial Applications

calcined-kaolin.description:
CALCINED KAOLIN, also known as aluminium silicate or metakaolin, is produced by heating high-quality natural kaolin at controlled high temperatures. This process removes bound water, improves brightness, enhances chemical stability, and increases the strength properties of the mineral.

It is widely used in industries such as paper, paints & coatings, plastics, rubber, ceramics, adhesives, and refractories due to its superior whiteness, opacity, and reinforcement characteristics.

keyFeatures.detail: Enhances color and gloss in paper, paints, and plastics.
Provides superior coverage and hiding power in coatings.
Improves strength and durability in rubber and plastics.
Resistant to acids and alkalis, suitable for multiple industrial applications.
Withstands high temperatures, making it ideal for ceramics and refractories.
Natural, non-toxic, and safe for use in various industries.

applications.use: Improves brightness, smoothness, and printability.
Enhances opacity and durability of paints.
Improves reinforcement, strength, and chemical resistance.
Provides thermal stability and high strength.
Improves bonding and performance.

calcined-kaolin.specNote: Specifications can be customized as per industry needs
calcined-kaolin.note: Calcined kaolin offers superior brightness, opacity, and performance, ensuring high-quality results in paper, paints, plastics, ceramics, and advanced industrial applications.

privacy-policy.title: Privacy Policy - Namakwala
privacy-policy.content: At Namakwala Group, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information provided by visitors to our website and applications.

banner.title: Data Privacy at Namakwala
banner.heading: Trust, Security, Transparency

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Namakwala Group is committed to protecting the privacy of our website and application visitors. We implement reasonable precautions to safeguard personal information and comply with all applicable legal and regulatory requirements.

information-collected.title: Information Collected
content: Personal Information such as name, contact details, email address, gender, and date of birth.
Sensitive Personal Data or Information (SPDI) including passwords, financial information, health data, biometric information, and any other details provided for services.
Non-personal information automatically collected such as usage patterns, device information, and cookies.

purpose.title: Purpose of Collection
content: To provide and improve our products and services.
To process orders or applications submitted by visitors.
To communicate updates, offers, and other relevant information.
To respond to feedback, inquiries, and complaints.
To ensure security and proper functioning of our website and applications.

retention.title: Retention and Security
content: Information is retained only as long as necessary to meet legal or business purposes.
We follow industry-standard security practices including managerial, technical, operational, and physical controls to protect information.
Our security practices are reviewed periodically to keep pace with business, technology, and regulatory changes.

disclosure.title: Disclosure of Information
content: We do not share information for purposes other than described without your consent, except where required by law.
Information may be shared with business partners under contractual obligations with adequate security measures.
Legal disclosure may occur if mandated by government authorities.

feedback.title: Feedback and Contact
content: For any feedback, concerns, or questions about this policy, you can contact us at info@namakwala.com

metadata.description: Learn about Namakwala Group's commitment to protecting your personal information and privacy.

legal-notice.title: Legal Notice
legal-notice.description: Official legal notice for Namakwala Group covering business activities, compliance, liability, intellectual property, governing law, and contact information.

banner.title: Legal Notice
banner.heading: Important information regarding Namakwala Group's business and policies

sections.heading: Namakwala Group – India’s Legacy in Salt & Minerals
sections.text: Namakwala serves a diverse international clientele with premium-quality minerals and salts, manufactured through world-class processes, supported by prompt and efficient customer service. Delivering quality, value, and trust worldwide.

sections.heading: Business Activities
sections.text: Namakwala is engaged in the manufacturing, trading, and export of a wide range of high-quality salts and minerals, including but not limited to edible salt, industrial salt, crystal salt, garnet abrasive, feldspar, quartz, mica, talc, bentonite, dolomite, and other industrial minerals. Our products are processed under strict quality standards and shipped to over 50 countries worldwide.

sections.heading: Disclaimer
sections.text: All information provided on this website, including product descriptions, specifications, images, and related content, is intended for general informational purposes only. While Namakwala takes all reasonable care to ensure the accuracy of the information, we make no warranties or representations, express or implied, regarding the completeness, reliability, or suitability of the content for any purpose.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.text: Namakwala shall not be held liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our products or reliance on the information provided. Users of our products and website assume full responsibility for compliance with local laws, import/export regulations, and industry standards.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.text: All content, logos, trademarks, and images on this website are the property of Namakwala and may not be copied, reproduced, or used without explicit written permission.

sections.heading: Compliance
sections.text: All our products comply with relevant Indian and international quality, safety, and regulatory standards, including ISO 9001:2015, HACCP, and HALAL certifications where applicable. Customers are responsible for ensuring that products meet the specific regulations of the importing country.

sections.heading: Governing Law
sections.text: This legal notice and any disputes related to Namakwala products or services shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any claims must be brought exclusively in the courts located in Bhilwara, India, unless otherwise agreed in writing.

sections.heading: Contact
sections.text:
For inquiries regarding legal, regulatory, or product information, please contact:
Email: info@namakwala.com
Phone: +91 9829 03 9590
Website: www.namakwala.com

fraud-alert.title: Fraud Alert
fraud-alert.description: Important advisory regarding fraudulent communications impersonating Namakwala Group across international markets.

banner.title: Fraud Alert
banner.heading: Important advisory regarding fraudulent communications impersonating Namakwala Group

sections.heading: Overview
sections.text: Certain persons unconnected with us have been masquerading as officials of Namakwala Group and are making business proposals to companies and individuals in several countries using fake email IDs ending with '@namakwala.vc', '@namakwala.sg', '@namakwala.us.com', or '@namakwalaexports.us'. These business proposals are in respect of raising funds, proposed partnerships, supply agreements, and job offers at senior management level.

sections.heading: Misrepresentation
sections.text: While making some of these proposals, it is being wrongly portrayed that these communications are made by Namakwala Group companies allegedly registered in other countries. To our knowledge, the names of companies which have been used for illegal activities are: Namakwala Exports LLC, Russia; Namakwala Minerals and Trading LLC, Russia; Namakwala Exports Limited, Delaware, USA; and Namakwala Minerals and Trading Limited LLC, Delaware, USA. Namakwala Group does not have any office anywhere in Russia or the USA other than our registered offices in India.

sections.heading: Official Email IDs
sections.text: Namakwala Group and its companies only use email IDs ending with '@namakwala.com'. Email IDs ending with '@namakwala.vc', '@namakwala.sg', '@namakwala.us.com', or '@namakwalaexports.us' are never used by us or our group of companies.

sections.heading: Legal Action
sections.text: A criminal complaint was filed by Namakwala Group on 15th January, 2022 against an individual who was found using fake email IDs ending with '@namakwala.vc'. These criminal proceedings are ongoing. Complaints have also been lodged with Mumbai Police (Cyber Cell) on 12th February, 2022 and 20th March, 2022 after noticing further use of fake email IDs to address communications to companies and individuals purporting to represent Namakwala Group.

sections.heading: Advisory
sections.text: You are advised not to enter into any correspondence or transactions of any nature whatsoever on the basis of a communication received from any email ID except '@namakwala.com'. Such correspondence or transactions will not bind Namakwala Group in any manner. If you receive any communication purporting to be from Namakwala Group from email IDs ending with '@namakwala.vc', '@namakwala.sg', '@namakwala.us.com', or '@namakwalaexports.us', kindly notify our Head – Fraud & Misconduct Investigations at fraud.alert@namakwala.com.

terms-of-service.title: Terms of Service
terms-of-service.description: Terms and conditions governing the use of Namakwala Group's website, products, and services.

banner.title: Terms of Service
banner.heading: Important information regarding the use of Namakwala Group's website, products, and services

sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms
sections.text: By accessing or using the Namakwala Group website, products, or services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree to these terms, you must not use our website or services.

sections.heading: Use of Products and Services
sections.text: Namakwala Group provides high-quality salts and minerals for various industries. Users agree to use our products and services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with all applicable regulations. Any misuse, resale, or unauthorized distribution is strictly prohibited.

sections.heading: User Responsibilities
sections.text: Users are responsible for ensuring compliance with local laws, import/export regulations, and industry standards when purchasing or using Namakwala products. You must provide accurate and complete information when placing orders or registering on our site.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.text: All content, logos, trademarks, images, and proprietary information on the Namakwala Group website and product materials are owned by Namakwala Group. Users may not copy, reproduce, distribute, or use this content without prior written permission.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.text: Namakwala Group shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website, products, or services. This includes, but is not limited to, damages related to product usage, errors, interruptions, or loss of data.

sections.heading: Product Information
sections.text: While Namakwala Group makes reasonable efforts to provide accurate product descriptions, specifications, and images, we do not guarantee the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of the information. Users should verify product details before use or purchase.

sections.heading: Privacy Policy
sections.text: Your use of our website and services is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.heading: Governing Law
sections.text: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes must be resolved exclusively in the courts located in Bhilwara, India.

sections.heading: Modifications
sections.text: Namakwala Group reserves the right to modify, update, or change these Terms of Service at any time without prior notice. Continued use of our website or services constitutes acceptance of any changes.

sections.heading: Contact Information
sections.text:
For questions regarding these Terms of Service, please contact:
Email: info@namakwala.com
Phone: +91 9829 03 9590
Website: www.namakwala.com

export-terms.title: Export Terms
export-terms.description: Terms and conditions governing the export of Namakwala Group's products to international clients.

banner.title: Export Terms
banner.heading: Important guidelines for international trade and export of Namakwala Group products

sections.heading: Order Placement
sections.text: All export orders must be placed through official Namakwala Group channels. Orders should include complete product details, quantities, shipping destination, and preferred payment terms.

sections.heading: Payment Terms
sections.text: Payments must be made in the currency agreed upon at the time of order confirmation. We accept bank transfers, letters of credit, or other agreed methods. Payment terms will be specified in the proforma invoice.

sections.heading: Shipping and Delivery
sections.text: All products will be shipped as per the agreed Incoterms. Shipping schedules are indicative and may be subject to change due to customs, logistics, or other external factors. Namakwala Group is not responsible for delays beyond our control.

sections.heading: Customs and Import Regulations
sections.text: The buyer is responsible for ensuring compliance with local import regulations, customs duties, and taxes. Namakwala Group will provide necessary shipping and commercial documentation but cannot be held liable for customs delays or penalties.

sections.heading: Risk and Title
sections.text: Risk of loss or damage transfers to the buyer upon shipment from our warehouse as per the agreed Incoterms. Ownership of products passes to the buyer only after full payment has been received.

sections.heading: Quality Assurance
sections.text: All products are manufactured under strict quality control standards. Any claims regarding product quality must be reported within 7 days of receipt, with supporting evidence. Namakwala Group reserves the right to inspect returned goods before any replacement or refund.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.text: Namakwala Group shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from export transactions. Our liability is limited to the value of the goods supplied.

sections.heading: Governing Law
sections.text: These Export Terms are governed by the laws of India. Any disputes arising from export orders will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in Bhilwara, India.

sections.heading: Contact Information
sections.text:
For queries regarding export orders, please contact:
Email: export@namakwala.com
Phone: +91 9829 03 9590
Website: www.namakwala.com

salt.title: Salt
salt.description:
Salt is one of the most essential minerals in daily life, used not only to enhance the taste of food but also to support overall health and well-being.

In every kitchen, edible salt plays a vital role in seasoning, preserving food, and bringing out natural flavors. From household cooking and baking to traditional pickling and modern packaged foods, salt ensures freshness and taste consistency.

Beyond culinary uses, salt is also important in maintaining electrolyte balance in the human body, supporting hydration, and aiding proper muscle and nerve function. Daily consumption of iodized salt helps prevent iodine deficiency, promoting healthy growth and mental development.

In households, salt is commonly used for cleaning, oral care (like gargling with salt water), and even skincare remedies. Across industries, industrial salt supports agriculture, water treatment, and chemical production, making it indispensable in modern life.

Salt in daily life is more than just a seasoning — it is a natural, versatile, and valuable mineral that connects taste, tradition, health, and industry in one simple crystal.

banner.title: Salt
banner.heading: Sustainable energy solutions with cutting-edge technology

sections.heading: Overview
sections.text: Our Salt business provides high-quality products and solutions for industrial and consumer needs.

sections.heading: Applications
sections.text: Salt products are used in food processing, chemical industries, and other applications to meet global standards.

minerals.title: Minerals
minerals.description:
Minerals are the foundation of modern industry and daily life, serving as essential resources across multiple sectors.

They are vital in producing steel, cement, glass, ceramics, and fertilizers, supporting agriculture, housing, and infrastructure development on a global scale.

In healthcare and nutrition, essential minerals such as calcium, iron, zinc, and magnesium strengthen bones, improve immunity, and maintain overall well-being.

Industrial minerals like silica, gypsum, and limestone play a key role in energy generation, water treatment, and environmental sustainability, making them indispensable for growth.

Minerals bridge the gap between natural resources and modern innovation, empowering industries, improving lives, and driving economic development toward a sustainable future.

sections.heading: Applications
sections.text: Materials are used in polymers, polyesters, elastomers, and other high-performance applications.

life-at-namakwala.title: Life at Namakwala
life-at-namakwala.content: Namakwala Group, life at work is dynamic, inclusive, and rewarding. We cultivate a positive work culture where innovation, collaboration, and employee well-being are at the core. Our team enjoys career growth opportunities, skill development programs, and exposure to global trade, salt and minerals industries. Every day at Namakwala is a chance to learn, contribute, and grow with a forward-thinking organization.
